gft::Matrix::_matrix Struct Reference

#include <gft_matrix.h>

Public Attributes

float * data
 
float ** array
 
int ncols
 
int nrows
 

Detailed Description

It supports both linear and two-dimensional access (i.e., M->data[p] or M->array[i][j] for an entry (i,j) at address p=j+i*ncols).
